snippet: After a series of devastating tornadoes, Shelly Berry and her daughters left North Carolina behind, only to find a string of bad luck in New York.
abstract: Children's Aid Society provides assistance to Shelly Berry of Harlem, enabling her to enroll her daughters in school with the hopes of soon moving them out of a shelter.
lead_paragraph: After a series of devastating tornadoes, Shelly Berry and her daughters left North Carolina behind, only to find a string of bad luck in New York.

headline.seo: After Losing Home to Storm, Still Looking for Housing
headline.main: Long After Southern Storm, Still Looking for New Home
headline.print_headline: Long After Southern Storm, Still Looking for New Home

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
